text: My son's girlfriend stayed home from work today. She was acting odd all day. I could tell something was wrong but did not know what.  My husband came home from work later and he was focused on his friends at work. He didn't want to talk about the kids or anything.  I felt alone and sad.  Basically I felt invisible.
